ETYMOLOGY/R ./O
(/O Supplied/R by/P a/D Late/G Consumptive/G Usher/N to/P a/D Grammar/R School/R )/O
The/D pale/G Usher/N --/O threadbare/N in/P coat/N ,/O heart/N ,/O body/N ,/O and/C brain/N ;/O I/Q see/V him/Q now/A ./O
He/Q was/V ever/A dusting/V his/Q old/G lexicons/N and/C grammars/N ,/O with/P a/D queer/G handkerchief/N ,/O mockingly/A embellished/V with/P all/D the/D gay/G flags/N of/P all/D the/D known/V nations/N of/P the/D world/N ./O
He/Q loved/V to/P dust/V his/Q old/G grammars/N ;/O it/Q somehow/A mildly/A reminded/V him/Q of/P his/Q mortality/N ./O
``/O While/P you/Q take/V in/P hand/N to/P school/V others/N ,/O and/C to/P teach/V them/Q by/P what/Q name/N a/D whale-fish/N is/V to/P be/V called/V in/P our/Q tongue/N leaving/V out/O ,/O through/P ignorance/N ,/O the/D letter/N H/R ,/O which/O almost/A alone/A maketh/P the/D signification/N of/P the/D word/N ,/O you/Q deliver/V that/P which/O is/V not/A true/G ./O ''/O

and/C Dan/R ./O
HVAL/R ./O
This/D animal/N is/V named/V from/P roundness/N or/C rolling/N ;/O for/P in/P Dan/R ./O
HVALT/R is/V arched/V or/C vaulted/V ./O ''/O

EXTRACTS/N (/O Supplied/V by/P a/D Sub-Sub-Librarian/G )/O ./O
It/Q will/O be/V seen/V that/P this/D mere/G painstaking/N burrower/N and/C grub-worm/N of/P a/D poor/G devil/N of/P a/D Sub-Sub/G appears/N to/P have/V gone/V through/P the/D long/G Vaticans/N and/C street-stalls/N of/P the/D earth/N ,/O picking/V up/O whatever/O random/G allusions/N to/P whales/N he/Q could/O anyways/A find/V in/P any/D book/N whatsoever/A ,/O sacred/G or/C profane/N ./O
Therefore/A you/Q must/O not/A ,/O in/P every/D case/N at/P least/G ,/O take/V the/D higgledy-piggledy/G whale/N statements/N ,/O however/A authentic/G ,/O in/P these/D extracts/N ,/O for/P veritable/G gospel/N cetology/N ./O
Far/A from/P it/Q ./O
As/P touching/V the/D ancient/G authors/N generally/A ,/O as/A well/A as/P the/D poets/N here/A appearing/V ,/O these/D extracts/N are/V solely/A valuable/G or/C entertaining/G ,/O as/P affording/V a/D glancing/V bird/N 's/O eye/N view/N of/P what/Q has/V been/V promiscuously/A said/V ,/O thought/V ,/O fancied/G ,/O and/C sung/V of/P Leviathan/R ,/O by/P many/G nations/N and/C generations/N ,/O including/V our/Q own/G ./O
So/A fare/V thee/O well/A ,/O poor/G devil/N of/P a/D Sub-Sub/R ,/O whose/Q commentator/N I/Q am/V ./O
Thou/Q belongest/V to/P that/D hopeless/G ,/O sallow/G tribe/N which/O no/D wine/N of/P this/D world/N will/O ever/A warm/V ;/O and/C for/P whom/Q even/A Pale/R Sherry/R would/O be/V too/A rosy-strong/G ;/O but/C with/P whom/Q one/O sometimes/A loves/V to/P sit/V ,/O and/C feel/V poor-devilish/G ,/O too/A ;/O and/C grow/V convivial/G upon/P tears/N ;/O and/C say/V to/P them/Q bluntly/A ,/O with/P full/G eyes/N and/C empty/G glasses/N ,/O and/C in/P not/A altogether/A unpleasant/G sadness/N --/O Give/V it/Q up/O ,/O Sub-Subs/N !/O
For/P by/P how/O much/G the/D more/G pains/N ye/Q take/V to/P please/V the/D world/N ,/O by/P so/A much/G the/D more/A shall/O ye/Q for/P ever/A go/V thankless/P !/O
Would/O that/P I/Q could/O clear/V out/O Hampton/R Court/R and/C the/D Tuileries/N for/P ye/Q !/O
But/C gulp/V down/O your/Q tears/N and/C hie/N aloft/A to/P the/D royal-mast/N with/P your/Q hearts/N ;/O for/P your/Q friends/N who/Q have/V gone/V before/A are/V clearing/V out/O the/D seven-storied/G heavens/N ,/O and/C making/V refugees/N of/P long-pampered/G Gabriel/R ,/O Michael/R ,/O and/C Raphael/R ,/O against/P your/Q coming/V ./O
Here/A ye/Q strike/V but/C splintered/V hearts/N together/A --/O there/A ,/O ye/Q shall/O strike/V unsplinterable/G glasses/N !/O

--/O HOLLAND/R 'S/O PLINY/N ./O

--/O WHALE/R SONG/R ./O
CHAPTER/R 1/O Loomings/R ./O
Call/V me/Q Ishmael/G ./O
Some/D years/N ago/A --/O never/A mind/V how/O long/G precisely/A --/O having/V little/G or/C no/D money/N in/P my/Q purse/N ,/O and/C nothing/N particular/G to/P interest/V me/Q on/P shore/N ,/O I/Q thought/V I/Q would/O sail/V about/P a/D little/G and/C see/V the/D watery/N part/N of/P the/D world/N ./O
It/Q is/V a/D way/N I/Q have/V of/P driving/V off/O the/D spleen/N and/C regulating/V the/D circulation/N ./O
Whenever/O I/Q find/V myself/Q growing/V grim/G about/P the/D mouth/N ;/O whenever/O it/Q is/V a/D damp/G ,/O drizzly/P November/R in/P my/Q soul/N ;/O whenever/O I/Q find/V myself/Q involuntarily/A pausing/V before/P coffin/N warehouses/N ,/O and/C bringing/V up/O the/D rear/N of/P every/D funeral/N I/Q meet/V ;/O and/C especially/A whenever/O my/Q hypos/N get/V such/G an/D upper/G hand/N of/P me/Q ,/O that/P it/Q requires/V a/D strong/G moral/G principle/N to/P prevent/V me/Q from/P deliberately/A stepping/V into/P the/D street/N ,/O and/C methodically/A knocking/V people/N 's/O hats/N off/A --/O then/A ,/O I/Q account/V it/Q high/G time/N to/P get/V to/P sea/N as/A soon/A as/P I/Q can/O ./O
This/D is/V my/Q substitute/N for/P pistol/N and/C ball/N ./O
With/P a/D philosophical/G flourish/G Cato/R throws/V himself/Q upon/P his/Q sword/N ;/O I/Q quietly/A take/V to/P the/D ship/N ./O

CHAPTER/N 7/O The/D Chapel/R ./O

He/Q made/V me/Q a/D present/N of/P his/Q embalmed/G head/N ;/O took/V out/O his/Q enormous/G tobacco/N wallet/N ,/O and/C groping/V under/P the/D tobacco/N ,/O drew/V out/O some/D thirty/O dollars/N in/P silver/N ;/O then/A spreading/V them/Q on/P the/D table/N ,/O and/C mechanically/A dividing/V them/Q into/P two/O equal/G portions/N ,/O pushed/V one/O of/P them/Q towards/P me/Q ,/O and/C said/V it/Q was/V mine/N ./O

thought/V I./N Do/V you/Q suppose/V now/A ,/O Ishmael/R ,/O that/P the/D magnanimous/G God/R of/P heaven/N and/C earth/N --/O pagans/N and/C all/D included/V --/O can/O possibly/A be/V jealous/G of/P an/D insignificant/G bit/N of/P black/G wood/N ?/O

Now/A ,/O Queequeg/R is/V my/Q fellow/G man/N ./O

CHAPTER/N 11/O Nightgown/R ./O
We/Q had/V lain/V thus/A in/P bed/N ,/O chatting/V and/C napping/V at/P short/G intervals/N ,/O and/C Queequeg/R now/A and/C then/A affectionately/A throwing/V his/Q brown/N tattooed/V legs/N over/P mine/N ,/O and/C then/A drawing/V them/Q back/A ;/O so/A entirely/A sociable/G and/C free/G and/C easy/G were/V we/Q ;/O when/O ,/O at/P last/G ,/O by/P reason/N of/P our/Q confabulations/N ,/O what/Q little/G nappishness/N remained/V in/P us/Q altogether/A departed/V ,/O and/C we/Q felt/V like/P getting/V up/O again/A ,/O though/P day-break/N was/V yet/A some/D way/N down/P the/D future/N ./O

Nothing/N exists/V in/P itself/Q ./O

CHAPTER/R 12/O Biographical/R ./O
Queequeg/R was/V a/D native/G of/P Rokovoko/R ,/O an/D island/N far/A away/A to/P the/D West/R and/C South/R ./O

On/P one/O side/N was/V a/D coral/G reef/N ;/O on/P the/D other/G a/D low/G tongue/N of/P land/N ,/O covered/V with/P mangrove/G thickets/N that/O grew/V out/O into/P the/D water/N ./O

CHAPTER/R 13/O Wheelbarrow/R ./O
Next/G morning/N ,/O Monday/R ,/O after/P disposing/V of/P the/D embalmed/G head/N to/P a/D barber/N ,/O for/P a/D block/N ,/O I/Q settled/V my/Q own/G and/C comrade/N 's/O bill/N ;/O using/V ,/O however/A ,/O my/Q comrade/N 's/O money/N ./O

CHAPTER/R 14/O Nantucket/N ./O
Nothing/N more/G happened/V on/P the/D passage/N worthy/G the/D mentioning/N ;/O so/A ,/O after/P a/D fine/G run/N ,/O we/Q safely/A arrived/V in/P Nantucket/R ./O
Nantucket/N !/O
Take/V out/O your/Q map/N and/C look/N at/P it/Q ./O
See/V what/Q a/D real/G corner/N of/P the/D world/N it/Q occupies/V ;/O how/O it/Q stands/V there/A ,/O away/A off/P shore/N ,/O more/G lonely/G than/P the/D Eddystone/R lighthouse/N ./O
Look/V at/P it/Q --/O a/D mere/G hillock/N ,/O and/C elbow/N of/P sand/N ;/O all/D beach/N ,/O without/P a/D background/N ./O
There/O is/V more/G sand/N there/A than/P you/Q would/O use/V in/P twenty/O years/N as/P a/D substitute/N for/P blotting/V paper/N ./O
Some/D gamesome/G wights/N will/O tell/V you/Q that/P they/Q have/V to/P plant/V weeds/N there/A ,/O they/Q do/V n't/A grow/V naturally/A ;/O that/P they/Q import/V Canada/R thistles/V ;/O that/P they/Q have/V to/P send/V beyond/P seas/N for/P a/D spile/N to/P stop/V a/D leak/N in/P an/D oil/N cask/N ;/O that/D pieces/N of/P wood/N in/P Nantucket/R are/V carried/V about/A like/P bits/N of/P the/D true/G cross/N in/P Rome/R ;/O that/D people/N there/A plant/N toadstools/N before/P their/Q houses/N ,/O to/P get/V under/P the/D shade/N in/P summer/N time/N ;/O that/D one/O blade/N of/P grass/N makes/V an/D oasis/N ,/O three/O blades/N in/P a/D day/N 's/O walk/N a/D prairie/N ;/O that/P they/Q wear/V quicksand/G shoes/N ,/O something/N like/P Laplander/N snow-shoes/N ;/O that/P they/Q are/V so/A shut/V up/O ,/O belted/V about/A ,/O every/D way/N inclosed/V ,/O surrounded/V ,/O and/C made/V an/D utter/G island/N of/P by/P the/D ocean/N ,/O that/P to/P their/Q very/A chairs/N and/C tables/N small/G clams/N will/O sometimes/A be/V found/V adhering/N ,/O as/P to/P the/D backs/N of/P sea/N turtles/N ./O
But/C these/D extravaganzas/N only/A show/V that/P Nantucket/R is/V no/D Illinois/R ./O
Look/V now/A at/P the/D wondrous/G traditional/G story/N of/P how/O this/D island/N was/V settled/V by/P the/D red-men/G ./O
Thus/A goes/V the/D legend/N ./O
In/P olden/G times/N an/D eagle/N swooped/V down/A upon/P the/D New/R England/R coast/N ,/O and/C carried/V off/O an/D infant/N Indian/G in/P his/Q talons/N ./O
With/P loud/G lament/N the/D parents/N saw/V their/Q child/N borne/V out/P of/P sight/N over/P the/D wide/G waters/N ./O
They/Q resolved/V to/P follow/V in/P the/D same/G direction/N ./O
Setting/V out/O in/P their/Q canoes/N ,/O after/P a/D perilous/G passage/N they/Q discovered/V the/D island/N ,/O and/C there/O they/Q found/V an/D empty/G ivory/N casket/N ,/O --/O the/D poor/G little/G Indian/R 's/O skeleton/N ./O
What/Q wonder/N ,/O then/A ,/O that/P these/D Nantucketers/N ,/O born/V on/P a/D beach/N ,/O should/O take/V to/P the/D sea/N for/P a/D livelihood/N !/O
They/Q first/A caught/V crabs/N and/C quohogs/N in/P the/D sand/N ;/O grown/G bolder/N ,/O they/Q waded/V out/O with/P nets/N for/P mackerel/N ;/O more/G experienced/G ,/O they/Q pushed/V off/O in/P boats/N and/C captured/V cod/N ;/O and/C at/P last/G ,/O launching/V a/D navy/N of/P great/G ships/N on/P the/D sea/N ,/O explored/V this/D watery/N world/N ;/O put/V an/D incessant/N belt/N of/P circumnavigations/N round/V it/Q ;/O peeped/V in/P at/P Behring/R 's/O Straits/N ;/O and/C in/P all/D seasons/N and/C all/D oceans/N declared/V everlasting/D war/N with/P the/D mightiest/G animated/G mass/N that/O has/V survived/V the/D flood/N ;/O most/G monstrous/G and/C most/A mountainous/G !/O
That/D Himmalehan/N ,/O salt-sea/N Mastodon/R ,/O clothed/V with/P such/G portentousness/N of/P unconscious/G power/N ,/O that/P his/Q very/A panics/N are/V more/A to/P be/V dreaded/V than/P his/Q most/A fearless/G and/C malicious/G assaults/N !/O
And/C thus/A have/V these/D naked/G Nantucketers/N ,/O these/D sea/N hermits/N ,/O issuing/V from/P their/Q ant-hill/G in/P the/D sea/N ,/O overrun/R and/C conquered/V the/D watery/N world/N like/P so/A many/G Alexanders/N ;/O parcelling/N out/O among/P them/Q the/D Atlantic/R ,/O Pacific/R ,/O and/C Indian/R oceans/N ,/O as/P the/D three/O pirate/G powers/N did/V Poland/R ./O
Let/V America/R add/V Mexico/R to/P Texas/R ,/O and/C pile/N Cuba/R upon/P Canada/R ;/O let/V the/D English/N overswarm/P all/D India/R ,/O and/C hang/V out/O their/Q blazing/V banner/N from/P the/D sun/N ;/O two/O thirds/N of/P this/D terraqueous/G globe/N are/V the/D Nantucketer/R 's/O ./O
For/P the/D sea/N is/V his/Q ;/O he/Q owns/V it/Q ,/O as/P Emperors/R own/G empires/N ;/O other/G seamen/N having/V but/C a/D right/N of/P way/N through/P it/Q ./O

CHAPTER/R 15/O Chowder/R ./O

Every/D one/O knows/V what/Q a/D multitude/N of/P things/N --/O beds/N ,/O sauce-pans/N ,/O knives/N and/C forks/N ,/O shovels/N and/C tongs/N ,/O napkins/R ,/O nut-crackers/N ,/O and/C what/Q not/A ,/O are/V indispensable/G to/P the/D business/N of/P housekeeping/N ./O

CHAPTER/N 32/O Cetology/N ./O

(/O FIN-BACK/R )/O ./O

In/P the/D length/N he/Q attains/V ,/O and/C in/P his/Q baleen/N ,/O the/D Fin-back/R resembles/V the/D right/G whale/N ,/O but/C is/V of/P a/D less/A portly/G girth/N ,/O and/C a/D lighter/G colour/N ,/O approaching/V to/P olive/V ./O

This/D fin/N is/V some/D three/O or/C four/O feet/N long/G ,/O growing/V vertically/A from/P the/D hinder/V part/N of/P the/D back/N ,/O of/P an/D angular/G shape/N ,/O and/C with/P a/D very/A sharp/G pointed/G end/N ./O
Even/A if/P not/A the/D slightest/G other/G part/N of/P the/D creature/N be/V visible/G ,/O this/D isolated/G fin/N will/O ,/O at/P times/N ,/O be/V seen/V plainly/A projecting/V from/P the/D surface/N ./O

On/P that/D Ahaz-dial/G the/D shadow/N often/A goes/V back/A ./O
The/D Fin-Back/R is/V not/A gregarious/G ./O

From/P having/V the/D baleen/N in/P his/Q mouth/N ,/O the/D Fin-Back/R is/V sometimes/A included/V with/P the/D right/N whale/N ,/O among/P a/D theoretic/G species/N denominated/V WHALEBONE/R WHALES/R ,/O that/D is/V ,/O whales/N with/P baleen/N ./O

(/O KILLER/R )/O ./O
--/O Of/P this/D whale/N little/A is/V precisely/A known/V to/P the/D Nantucketer/R ,/O and/C nothing/N at/P all/D to/P the/D professed/G naturalist/N ./O
From/P what/Q I/Q have/V seen/V of/P him/Q at/P a/D distance/N ,/O I/Q should/O say/V that/P he/Q was/V about/P the/D bigness/N of/P a/D grampus/N ./O

(/O OCTAVO/R )/O ,/O CHAPTER/R V./R (/O THRASHER/R )/O ./O

He/Q mounts/V the/D Folio/N whale/N 's/O back/N ,/O and/C as/P he/Q swims/V ,/O he/Q works/V his/Q passage/N by/P flogging/V him/Q ;/O as/P some/D schoolmasters/N get/V along/A in/P the/D world/N by/P a/D similar/G process/N ./O

BOOK/R III/R ./O
(/O DUODECIMO/R )/O ,/O CHAPTER/R 1/O ./O
(/O HUZZA/R PORPOISE/R )/O ./O
--/O This/D is/V the/D common/G porpoise/N found/V almost/A all/D over/P the/D globe/N ./O
The/D name/N is/V of/P my/Q own/G bestowal/N ;/O for/P there/O are/V more/G than/P one/O sort/N of/P porpoises/N ,/O and/C something/N must/O be/V done/V to/P distinguish/V them/Q ./O
I/Q call/V him/Q thus/A ,/O because/P he/Q always/A swims/V in/P hilarious/G shoals/N ,/O which/O upon/P the/D broad/G sea/N keep/N tossing/V themselves/Q to/P heaven/N like/P caps/N in/P a/D Fourth-of-July/G crowd/N ./O
Their/Q appearance/N is/V generally/A hailed/V with/P delight/N by/P the/D mariner/N ./O
Full/R of/P fine/G spirits/N ,/O they/Q invariably/A come/V from/P the/D breezy/G billows/N to/P windward/V ./O
They/Q are/V the/D lads/N that/O always/A live/V before/P the/D wind/N ./O
They/Q are/V accounted/V a/D lucky/G omen/N ./O
If/P you/Q yourself/Q can/O withstand/V three/O cheers/N at/P beholding/V these/D vivacious/G fish/N ,/O then/A heaven/N help/N ye/Q ;/O the/D spirit/N of/P godly/A gamesomeness/N is/V not/A in/P ye/Q ./O
A/D well-fed/G ,/O plump/V Huzza/R Porpoise/R will/O yield/V you/Q one/O good/G gallon/N of/P good/G oil/N ./O
But/C the/D fine/N and/C delicate/G fluid/N extracted/V from/P his/Q jaws/N is/V exceedingly/A valuable/G ./O
It/Q is/V in/P request/N among/P jewellers/N and/C watchmakers/N ./O
Sailors/R put/V it/Q on/P their/Q hones/N ./O
Porpoise/R meat/N is/V good/G eating/N ,/O you/Q know/V ./O
It/Q may/O never/A have/V occurred/V to/P you/Q that/P a/D porpoise/N spouts/N ./O
Indeed/A ,/O his/Q spout/N is/V so/A small/G that/P it/Q is/V not/A very/A readily/A discernible/G ./O
But/C the/D next/G time/N you/Q have/V a/D chance/N ,/O watch/V him/Q ;/O and/C you/Q will/O then/A see/V the/D great/G Sperm/R whale/N himself/Q in/P miniature/N ./O

(/O MEALY-MOUTHED/R PORPOISE/R )/O ./O
--/O The/D largest/G kind/N of/P Porpoise/N ;/O and/C only/A found/V in/P the/D Pacific/R ,/O so/A far/A as/P it/Q is/V known/V ./O
The/D only/G English/R name/N ,/O by/P which/O he/Q has/V hitherto/V been/V designated/V ,/O is/V that/P of/P the/D fishers/N --/O Right-Whale/R Porpoise/R ,/O from/P the/D circumstance/N that/P he/Q is/V chiefly/A found/V in/P the/D vicinity/N of/P that/D Folio/N ./O
In/P shape/N ,/O he/Q differs/V in/P some/D degree/N from/P the/D Huzza/R Porpoise/R ,/O being/V of/P a/D less/A rotund/G and/C jolly/A girth/N ;/O indeed/A ,/O he/Q is/V of/P quite/A a/D neat/G and/C gentleman-like/G figure/N ./O
He/Q has/V no/D fins/N on/P his/Q back/N (/O most/A other/G porpoises/N have/V )/O ,/O he/Q has/V a/D lovely/G tail/N ,/O and/C sentimental/G Indian/G eyes/N of/P a/D hazel/N hue/N ./O
But/C his/Q mealy-mouth/N spoils/N all/D ./O
Though/P his/Q entire/N back/A down/P to/P his/Q side/N fins/N is/V of/P a/D deep/G sable/N ,/O yet/C a/D boundary/N line/N ,/O distinct/G as/P the/D mark/N in/P a/D ship/N 's/O hull/G ,/O called/V the/D ``/O bright/G waist/N ,/O ''/O that/P line/N streaks/V him/Q from/P stem/N to/P stern/N ,/O with/P two/O separate/G colours/N ,/O black/G above/P and/C white/G below/P ./O
The/D white/G comprises/V part/N of/P his/Q head/N ,/O and/C the/D whole/N of/P his/Q mouth/N ,/O which/O makes/V him/Q look/V as/P if/P he/Q had/V just/A escaped/V from/P a/D felonious/G visit/N to/P a/D meal-bag/N ./O
A/D most/A mean/G and/C mealy/G aspect/N !/O
His/Q oil/N is/V much/A like/P that/D of/P the/D common/G porpoise/N ./O
Beyond/P the/D DUODECIMO/R ,/O this/D system/N does/V not/A proceed/V ,/O inasmuch/G as/P the/D Porpoise/R is/V the/D smallest/G of/P the/D whales/N ./O
Above/R ,/O you/Q have/V all/D the/D Leviathans/N of/P note/N ./O
But/C there/O are/V a/D rabble/N of/P uncertain/G ,/O fugitive/G ,/O half-fabulous/G whales/N ,/O which/O ,/O as/P an/D American/G whaleman/N ,/O I/Q know/V by/P reputation/N ,/O but/C not/A personally/A ./O
I/Q shall/O enumerate/V them/Q by/P their/Q fore-castle/G appellations/N ;/O for/P possibly/A such/G a/D list/N may/O be/V valuable/G to/P future/G investigators/N ,/O who/Q may/O complete/V what/Q I/Q have/V here/A but/C begun/V ./O
If/P any/D of/P the/D following/G whales/N ,/O shall/O hereafter/A be/V caught/V and/C marked/V ,/O then/A he/Q can/O readily/A be/V incorporated/V into/P this/D System/N ,/O according/V to/P his/Q Folio/N ,/O Octavo/R ,/O or/C Duodecimo/R magnitude/N :/O --/O The/D Bottle-Nose/G Whale/N ;/O the/D Junk/N Whale/N ;/O the/D Pudding-Headed/G Whale/N ;/O the/D Cape/R Whale/N ;/O the/D Leading/G Whale/N ;/O the/D Cannon/R Whale/N ;/O the/D Scragg/R Whale/N ;/O the/D Coppered/G Whale/N ;/O the/D Elephant/N Whale/N ;/O the/D Iceberg/R Whale/N ;/O the/D Quog/R Whale/N ;/O the/D Blue/R Whale/R ;/O etc./N ./O
From/P Icelandic/R ,/O Dutch/R ,/O and/C old/G English/G authorities/N ,/O there/O might/O be/V quoted/V other/G lists/N of/P uncertain/G whales/N ,/O blessed/V with/P all/D manner/N of/P uncouth/G names/N ./O
But/C I/Q omit/V them/Q as/P altogether/A obsolete/G ;/O and/C can/O hardly/A help/V suspecting/V them/Q for/P mere/G sounds/N ,/O full/G of/P Leviathanism/R ,/O but/C signifying/V nothing/N ./O
Finally/A :/O It/Q was/V stated/V at/P the/D outset/N ,/O that/P this/D system/N would/O not/A be/V here/A ,/O and/C at/P once/A ,/O perfected/V ./O
You/Q can/O not/A but/C plainly/A see/V that/P I/Q have/V kept/V my/Q word/N ./O
But/C I/Q now/A leave/V my/Q cetological/G System/R standing/N thus/A unfinished/G ,/O even/A as/P the/D great/G Cathedral/R of/P Cologne/R was/V left/V ,/O with/P the/D crane/N still/A standing/V upon/P the/D top/N of/P the/D uncompleted/G tower/N ./O

CHAPTER/N 33/O The/D Specksynder/N ./O
Concerning/V the/D officers/N of/P the/D whale-craft/N ,/O this/D seems/V as/P good/G a/D place/N as/P any/D to/P set/V down/O a/D little/G domestic/G peculiarity/N on/P ship-board/N ,/O arising/V from/P the/D existence/N of/P the/D harpooneer/N class/N of/P officers/N ,/O a/D class/N unknown/N of/P course/N in/P any/D other/G marine/G than/P the/D whale-fleet/N ./O
The/D large/G importance/N attached/V to/P the/D harpooneer/N 's/O vocation/N is/V evinced/V by/P the/D fact/N ,/O that/O originally/A in/P the/D old/G Dutch/G Fishery/N ,/O two/O centuries/N and/C more/G ago/A ,/O the/D command/N of/P a/D whale/N ship/N was/V not/A wholly/A lodged/V in/P the/D person/N now/A called/V the/D captain/N ,/O but/C was/V divided/V between/P him/Q and/C an/D officer/N called/V the/D Specksynder/N ./O
Literally/A this/D word/N means/V Fat-Cutter/R ;/O usage/N ,/O however/A ,/O in/P time/N made/V it/Q equivalent/G to/P Chief/R Harpooneer/R ./O
In/P those/D days/N ,/O the/D captain/N 's/O authority/N was/V restricted/V to/P the/D navigation/N and/C general/G management/N of/P the/D vessel/N ;/O while/P over/P the/D whale-hunting/N department/N and/C all/D its/Q concerns/N ,/O the/D Specksynder/N or/C Chief/R Harpooneer/R reigned/V supreme/N ./O
In/P the/D British/G Greenland/R Fishery/N ,/O under/P the/D corrupted/G title/N of/P Specksioneer/R ,/O this/D old/G Dutch/R official/N is/V still/A retained/V ,/O but/C his/Q former/G dignity/N is/V sadly/A abridged/V ./O
At/P present/N he/Q ranks/V simply/A as/P senior/G Harpooneer/R ;/O and/C as/P such/G ,/O is/V but/C one/O of/P the/D captain/N 's/O more/G inferior/G subalterns/N ./O
Nevertheless/A ,/O as/P upon/P the/D good/G conduct/N of/P the/D harpooneers/N the/D success/N of/P a/D whaling/N voyage/N largely/A depends/V ,/O and/C since/P in/P the/D American/G Fishery/N he/Q is/V not/A only/A an/D important/G officer/N in/P the/D boat/N ,/O but/C under/P certain/G circumstances/N (/O night/N watches/V on/P a/D whaling/N ground/N )/O the/D command/N of/P the/D ship/N 's/O deck/N is/V also/A his/Q ;/O therefore/A the/D grand/G political/G maxim/N of/P the/D sea/N demands/N ,/O that/P he/Q should/O nominally/A live/V apart/A from/P the/D men/N before/P the/D mast/N ,/O and/C be/V in/P some/D way/N distinguished/V as/P their/Q professional/G superior/G ;/O though/P always/A ,/O by/P them/Q ,/O familiarly/A regarded/V as/P their/Q social/G equal/G ./O
Now/A ,/O the/D grand/G distinction/N drawn/V between/P officer/N and/C man/N at/P sea/N ,/O is/V this/D --/O the/D first/G lives/N aft/N ,/O the/D last/G forward/A ./O
Hence/A ,/O in/P whale-ships/N and/C merchantmen/N alike/A ,/O the/D mates/N have/V their/Q quarters/N with/P the/D captain/N ;/O and/C so/A ,/O too/A ,/O in/P most/G of/P the/D American/G whalers/N the/D harpooneers/N are/V lodged/V in/P the/D after/P part/N of/P the/D ship/N ./O
That/D is/V to/P say/V ,/O they/Q take/V their/Q meals/N in/P the/D captain/N 's/O cabin/N ,/O and/C sleep/V in/P a/D place/N indirectly/A communicating/V with/P it/Q ./O
Though/P the/D long/G period/N of/P a/D Southern/R whaling/R voyage/N (/O by/P far/A the/D longest/G of/P all/D voyages/N now/A or/C ever/A made/V by/P man/N )/O ,/O the/D peculiar/G perils/N of/P it/Q ,/O and/C the/D community/N of/P interest/N prevailing/V among/P a/D company/N ,/O all/D of/P whom/Q ,/O high/G or/C low/G ,/O depend/V for/P their/Q profits/N ,/O not/A upon/P fixed/V wages/N ,/O but/C upon/P their/Q common/G luck/N ,/O together/A with/P their/Q common/G vigilance/N ,/O intrepidity/N ,/O and/C hard/G work/N ;/O though/P all/D these/D things/N do/V in/P some/D cases/N tend/V to/P beget/V a/D less/A rigorous/G discipline/N than/P in/P merchantmen/N generally/A ;/O yet/A ,/O never/A mind/V how/O much/G like/P an/D old/G Mesopotamian/G family/N these/D whalemen/N may/O ,/O in/P some/D primitive/G instances/N ,/O live/V together/A ;/O for/P all/D that/D ,/O the/D punctilious/G externals/N ,/O at/P least/G ,/O of/P the/D quarter-deck/N are/V seldom/A materially/A relaxed/V ,/O and/C in/P no/D instance/N done/V away/A ./O
Indeed/A ,/O many/G are/V the/D Nantucket/N ships/N in/P which/O you/Q will/O see/V the/D skipper/N parading/V his/Q quarter-deck/N with/P an/D elated/G grandeur/N not/A surpassed/V in/P any/D military/G navy/N ;/O nay/N ,/O extorting/V almost/A as/A much/G outward/N homage/N as/P if/P he/Q wore/V the/D imperial/G purple/N ,/O and/C not/A the/D shabbiest/G of/P pilot-cloth/G ./O
And/C though/P of/P all/D men/N the/D moody/N captain/N of/P the/D Pequod/N was/V the/D least/G given/V to/P that/D sort/N of/P shallowest/N assumption/N ;/O and/C though/P the/D only/G homage/N he/Q ever/A exacted/V ,/O was/V implicit/G ,/O instantaneous/G obedience/N ;/O though/P he/Q required/V no/D man/N to/P remove/V the/D shoes/N from/P his/Q feet/N ere/V stepping/V upon/P the/D quarter-deck/N ;/O and/C though/P there/O were/V times/N when/O ,/O owing/V to/P peculiar/G circumstances/N connected/V with/P events/N hereafter/A to/P be/V detailed/V ,/O he/Q addressed/V them/Q in/P unusual/G terms/N ,/O whether/P of/P condescension/N or/C IN/P TERROREM/R ,/O or/C otherwise/A ;/O yet/A even/A Captain/R Ahab/R was/V by/P no/D means/N unobservant/G of/P the/D paramount/G forms/N and/C usages/N of/P the/D sea/N ./O
Nor/C ,/O perhaps/A ,/O will/O it/Q fail/V to/P be/V eventually/A perceived/V ,/O that/P behind/P those/D forms/N and/C usages/N ,/O as/P it/Q were/V ,/O he/Q sometimes/A masked/V himself/Q ;/O incidentally/A making/V use/N of/P them/Q for/P other/G and/C more/A private/G ends/N than/P they/Q were/V legitimately/A intended/V to/P subserve/V ./O
That/D certain/G sultanism/N of/P his/Q brain/N ,/O which/O had/V otherwise/A in/P a/D good/G degree/N remained/V unmanifested/G ;/O through/P those/D forms/N that/P same/G sultanism/N became/V incarnate/G in/P an/D irresistible/G dictatorship/N ./O
For/P be/V a/D man/N 's/O intellectual/G superiority/N what/Q it/Q will/O ,/O it/Q can/O never/A assume/V the/D practical/G ,/O available/G supremacy/N over/P other/G men/N ,/O without/P the/D aid/N of/P some/D sort/N of/P external/G arts/N and/C entrenchments/N ,/O always/A ,/O in/P themselves/Q ,/O more/A or/C less/A paltry/G and/C base/N ./O
This/D it/Q is/V ,/O that/P for/P ever/A keeps/V God/R 's/O true/G princes/N of/P the/D Empire/R from/P the/D world/N 's/O hustings/N ;/O and/C leaves/V the/D highest/G honours/N that/P this/D air/N can/O give/V ,/O to/P those/D men/N who/Q become/V famous/G more/G through/P their/Q infinite/G inferiority/N to/P the/D choice/N hidden/V handful/N of/P the/D Divine/R Inert/R ,/O than/P through/P their/Q undoubted/G superiority/N over/P the/D dead/G level/N of/P the/D mass/N ./O
Such/G large/G virtue/N lurks/N in/P these/D small/G things/N when/O extreme/G political/G superstitions/N invest/V them/Q ,/O that/P in/P some/D royal/G instances/N even/A to/P idiot/N imbecility/N they/Q have/V imparted/V potency/N ./O
But/C when/O ,/O as/P in/P the/D case/N of/P Nicholas/N the/D Czar/N ,/O the/D ringed/G crown/N of/P geographical/G empire/N encircles/V an/D imperial/G brain/N ;/O then/A ,/O the/D plebeian/G herds/N crouch/N abased/V before/P the/D tremendous/G centralization/N ./O
Nor/C ,/O will/O the/D tragic/G dramatist/N who/Q would/O depict/V mortal/G indomitableness/N in/P its/Q fullest/G sweep/N and/C direct/G swing/N ,/O ever/A forget/V a/D hint/N ,/O incidentally/A so/A important/G in/P his/Q art/N ,/O as/P the/D one/N now/A alluded/G to/P ./O
But/C Ahab/R ,/O my/Q Captain/R ,/O still/A moves/N before/P me/Q in/P all/D his/Q Nantucket/N grimness/N and/C shagginess/N ;/O and/C in/P this/D episode/N touching/N Emperors/N and/C Kings/N ,/O I/Q must/O not/A conceal/V that/P I/Q have/V only/A to/P do/V with/P a/D poor/G old/G whale-hunter/N like/P him/Q ;/O and/C ,/O therefore/A ,/O all/D outward/G majestical/G trappings/N and/C housings/N are/V denied/V me/Q ./O

CHAPTER/N 34/O The/D Cabin-Table/G ./O
It/Q is/V noon/N ;/O and/C Dough-Boy/R ,/O the/D steward/N ,/O thrusting/V his/Q pale/G loaf-of-bread/G face/N from/P the/D cabin-scuttle/N ,/O announces/V dinner/N to/P his/Q lord/N and/C master/N ;/O who/Q ,/O sitting/V in/P the/D lee/N quarter-boat/N ,/O has/V just/A been/V taking/V an/D observation/N of/P the/D sun/N ;/O and/C is/V now/A mutely/A reckoning/V the/D latitude/N on/P the/D smooth/G ,/O medallion-shaped/G tablet/N ,/O reserved/V for/P that/D daily/G purpose/N on/P the/D upper/G part/N of/P his/Q ivory/G leg/N ./O

And/C as/P when/O Spring/R and/C Summer/R had/V departed/V ,/O that/P wild/G Logan/N of/P the/D woods/N ,/O burying/V himself/Q in/P the/D hollow/N of/P a/D tree/N ,/O lived/V out/O the/D winter/N there/A ,/O sucking/V his/Q own/G paws/N ;/O so/A ,/O in/P his/Q inclement/N ,/O howling/V old/G age/N ,/O Ahab/R 's/O soul/N ,/O shut/V up/O in/P the/D caved/G trunk/N of/P his/Q body/N ,/O there/O fed/V upon/P the/D sullen/G paws/N of/P its/Q gloom/N !/O
CHAPTER/N 35/O The/D Mast-Head/N ./O
It/Q was/V during/P the/D more/A pleasant/G weather/N ,/O that/P in/P due/G rotation/N with/P the/D other/G seamen/G my/Q first/G mast-head/N came/V round/N ./O
In/P most/G American/G whalemen/N the/D mast-heads/N are/V manned/V almost/A simultaneously/A with/P the/D vessel/N 's/O leaving/V her/Q port/N ;/O even/A though/P she/Q may/O have/V fifteen/O thousand/O miles/N ,/O and/C more/A ,/O to/P sail/V ere/R reaching/V her/Q proper/G cruising/N ground/N ./O
And/C if/P ,/O after/P a/D three/O ,/O four/O ,/O or/C five/O years/N '/O voyage/N she/Q is/V drawing/V nigh/G home/N with/P anything/N empty/G in/P her/Q --/O say/V ,/O an/D empty/G vial/N even/A --/O then/A ,/O her/Q mast-heads/N are/V kept/V manned/G to/P the/D last/G ;/O and/C not/A till/P her/Q skysail-poles/N sail/N in/P among/P the/D spires/N of/P the/D port/N ,/O does/V she/Q altogether/A relinquish/V the/D hope/N of/P capturing/V one/O whale/N more/G ./O
Now/A ,/O as/P the/D business/N of/P standing/V mast-heads/N ,/O ashore/A or/C afloat/A ,/O is/V a/D very/A ancient/G and/C interesting/G one/O ,/O let/V us/Q in/P some/D measure/N expatiate/N here/A ./O
I/Q take/V it/Q ,/O that/P the/D earliest/G standers/N of/P mast-heads/N were/V the/D old/G Egyptians/N ;/O because/P ,/O in/P all/D my/Q researches/N ,/O I/Q find/V none/N prior/A to/P them/Q ./O
For/P though/P their/Q progenitors/N ,/O the/D builders/N of/P Babel/R ,/O must/O doubtless/A ,/O by/P their/Q tower/N ,/O have/V intended/V to/P rear/V the/D loftiest/N mast-head/N in/P all/D Asia/R ,/O or/C Africa/R either/C ;/O yet/A (/O ere/R the/D final/G truck/N was/V put/V to/P it/Q )/O as/P that/D great/G stone/N mast/N of/P theirs/Q may/O be/V said/V to/P have/V gone/V by/P the/D board/N ,/O in/P the/D dread/N gale/N of/P God/R 's/O wrath/N ;/O therefore/A ,/O we/Q can/O not/A give/V these/D Babel/R builders/N priority/N over/P the/D Egyptians/N ./O
And/C that/P the/D Egyptians/N were/V a/D nation/N of/P mast-head/N standers/N ,/O is/V an/D assertion/N based/V upon/P the/D general/G belief/N among/P archaeologists/N ,/O that/P the/D first/G pyramids/N were/V founded/V for/P astronomical/G purposes/N :/O a/D theory/N singularly/A supported/V by/P the/D peculiar/G stair-like/G formation/N of/P all/D four/O sides/N of/P those/D edifices/N ;/O whereby/O ,/O with/P prodigious/G long/G upliftings/N of/P their/Q legs/N ,/O those/D old/G astronomers/N were/V wont/G to/P mount/V to/P the/D apex/N ,/O and/C sing/V out/O for/P new/G stars/N ;/O even/A as/P the/D look-outs/N of/P a/D modern/G ship/N sing/V out/O for/P a/D sail/N ,/O or/C a/D whale/N just/A bearing/V in/P sight/N ./O
In/P Saint/R Stylites/N ,/O the/D famous/G Christian/R hermit/N of/P old/G times/N ,/O who/Q built/V him/Q a/D lofty/G stone/N pillar/N in/P the/D desert/N and/C spent/V the/D whole/G latter/G portion/N of/P his/Q life/N on/P its/Q summit/N ,/O hoisting/V his/Q food/N from/P the/D ground/N with/P a/D tackle/N ;/O in/P him/Q we/Q have/V a/D remarkable/G instance/N of/P a/D dauntless/G stander-of-mast-heads/N ;/O who/Q was/V not/A to/P be/V driven/V from/P his/Q place/N by/P fogs/N or/C frosts/N ,/O rain/N ,/O hail/N ,/O or/C sleet/N ;/O but/C valiantly/A facing/V everything/N out/A to/P the/D last/G ,/O literally/A died/V at/P his/Q post/N ./O
Of/P modern/G standers-of-mast-heads/N we/Q have/V but/C a/D lifeless/G set/N ;/O mere/G stone/N ,/O iron/N ,/O and/C bronze/N men/N ;/O who/Q ,/O though/A well/A capable/G of/P facing/V out/O a/D stiff/G gale/N ,/O are/V still/A entirely/A incompetent/G to/P the/D business/N of/P singing/V out/O upon/P discovering/V any/D strange/G sight/N ./O
There/O is/V Napoleon/R ;/O who/Q ,/O upon/P the/D top/N of/P the/D column/N of/P Vendome/R ,/O stands/V with/P arms/N folded/V ,/O some/D one/O hundred/O and/C fifty/O feet/N in/P the/D air/N ;/O careless/G ,/O now/A ,/O who/Q rules/V the/D decks/N below/P ;/O whether/P Louis/R Philippe/R ,/O Louis/R Blanc/R ,/O or/C Louis/R the/D Devil/R ./O
Great/R Washington/R ,/O too/A ,/O stands/V high/G aloft/N on/P his/Q towering/V main-mast/G in/P Baltimore/R ,/O and/C like/P one/O of/P Hercules/R '/O pillars/N ,/O his/Q column/N marks/V that/D point/N of/P human/G grandeur/N beyond/P which/O few/G mortals/N will/O go/V ./O
Admiral/R Nelson/R ,/O also/A ,/O on/P a/D capstan/N of/P gun-metal/N ,/O stands/V his/Q mast-head/N in/P Trafalgar/R Square/R ;/O and/C ever/A when/O most/G obscured/G by/P that/D London/R smoke/N ,/O token/N is/V yet/A given/V that/P a/D hidden/G hero/N is/V there/A ;/O for/P where/O there/O is/V smoke/N ,/O must/O be/V fire/N ./O

The/D worthy/G Obed/R tells/V us/Q ,/O that/P in/P the/D early/G times/N of/P the/D whale/N fishery/N ,/O ere/R ships/N were/V regularly/A launched/V in/P pursuit/N of/P the/D game/N ,/O the/D people/N of/P that/D island/N erected/V lofty/G spars/N along/P the/D sea-coast/N ,/O to/P which/O the/D look-outs/N ascended/V by/P means/N of/P nailed/V cleats/N ,/O something/N as/P fowls/N go/V upstairs/A in/P a/D hen-house/N ./O

But/C this/D custom/N has/V now/A become/V obsolete/G ;/O turn/N we/Q then/A to/P the/D one/O proper/G mast-head/N ,/O that/P of/P a/D whale-ship/N at/P sea/N ./O
The/D three/O mast-heads/N are/V kept/V manned/G from/P sun-rise/N to/P sun-set/V ;/O the/D seamen/N taking/V their/Q regular/G turns/N (/O as/P at/P the/D helm/N )/O ,/O and/C relieving/V each/D other/G every/D two/O hours/N ./O

And/C let/V me/Q in/P this/D place/N movingly/A admonish/V you/Q ,/O ye/Q ship-owners/N of/P Nantucket/N !/O

CHAPTER/N 54/O The/D Town-Ho/R 's/O Story/R ./O
(/O AS/R TOLD/R AT/O THE/D GOLDEN/R INN/R )/O The/D Cape/N of/P Good/G Hope/N ,/O and/C all/D the/D watery/N region/N round/N about/P there/A ,/O is/V much/A like/P some/D noted/V four/O corners/N of/P a/D great/G highway/N ,/O where/O you/Q meet/V more/G travellers/N than/P in/P any/D other/G part/N ./O

CHAPTER/N 65/O The/D Whale/N as/P a/D Dish/R ./O
That/D mortal/G man/N should/O feed/V upon/P the/D creature/N that/O feeds/V his/Q lamp/N ,/O and/C ,/O like/P Stubb/R ,/O eat/V him/Q by/P his/Q own/G light/N ,/O as/P you/Q may/O say/V ;/O this/D seems/V so/A outlandish/P a/D thing/N that/O one/O must/O needs/N go/V a/D little/A into/P the/D history/N and/C philosophy/N of/P it/Q ./O

CHAPTER/R 67/O Cutting/V In/P ./O
It/Q was/V a/D Saturday/R night/N ,/O and/C such/G a/D Sabbath/N as/A followed/V !/O

For/P young/G whales/N ,/O in/P the/D highest/G health/N ,/O and/C swelling/V with/P noble/G aspirations/N ,/O prematurely/A cut/V off/O in/P the/D warm/G flush/N and/C May/R of/P life/N ,/O with/P all/D their/Q panting/V lard/N about/P them/Q ;/O even/A these/D brawny/G ,/O buoyant/G heroes/N do/V sometimes/A sink/V ./O

Say/V you/Q strike/V a/D Forty-barrel-bull/G --/O poor/G devil/N !/O
all/D his/Q comrades/N quit/V him/Q ./O
But/C strike/V a/D member/N of/P the/D harem/N school/N ,/O and/C her/Q companions/N swim/V around/P her/Q with/P every/D token/G of/P concern/N ,/O sometimes/A lingering/V so/A near/P her/Q and/C so/A long/A ,/O as/P themselves/Q to/P fall/V a/D prey/N ./O
CHAPTER/N 89/O Fast-Fish/G and/C Loose-Fish/G ./O
The/D allusion/N to/P the/D waif/N and/C waif-poles/N in/P the/D last/G chapter/N but/C one/O ,/O necessitates/V some/D account/N of/P the/D laws/N and/C regulations/N of/P the/D whale/N fishery/N ,/O of/P which/O the/D waif/N may/O be/V deemed/V the/D grand/G symbol/N and/C badge/N ./O
It/Q frequently/A happens/V that/P when/O several/G ships/N are/V cruising/V in/P company/N ,/O a/D whale/N may/O be/V struck/V by/P one/O vessel/N ,/O then/A escape/N ,/O and/C be/V finally/A killed/V and/C captured/V by/P another/D vessel/N ;/O and/C herein/A are/V indirectly/A comprised/V many/G minor/G contingencies/N ,/O all/D partaking/N of/P this/D one/O grand/G feature/N ./O
For/P example/N ,/O --/O after/P a/D weary/G and/C perilous/G chase/N and/C capture/N of/P a/D whale/N ,/O the/D body/N may/O get/V loose/A from/P the/D ship/N by/P reason/N of/P a/D violent/G storm/N ;/O and/C drifting/V far/A away/A to/P leeward/N ,/O be/V retaken/V by/P a/D second/G whaler/N ,/O who/Q ,/O in/P a/D calm/N ,/O snugly/A tows/V it/Q alongside/A ,/O without/P risk/N of/P life/N or/C line/N ./O
Thus/A the/D most/A vexatious/G and/C violent/G disputes/N would/O often/A arise/V between/P the/D fishermen/N ,/O were/V there/O not/A some/D written/V or/C unwritten/V ,/O universal/G ,/O undisputed/G law/N applicable/G to/P all/D cases/N ./O
Perhaps/A the/D only/G formal/G whaling/N code/N authorized/V by/P legislative/G enactment/N ,/O was/V that/P of/P Holland/R ./O
It/Q was/V decreed/V by/P the/D States-General/R in/P A.D./R 1695/O ./O
But/C though/P no/D other/G nation/N has/V ever/A had/V any/D written/V whaling/V law/N ,/O yet/C the/D American/G fishermen/N have/V been/V their/Q own/G legislators/N and/C lawyers/N in/P this/D matter/N ./O
They/Q have/V provided/V a/D system/N which/O for/P terse/G comprehensiveness/N surpasses/V Justinian/R 's/O Pandects/N and/C the/D By-laws/N of/P the/D Chinese/R Society/R for/P the/D Suppression/N of/P Meddling/V with/P other/G People/N 's/O Business/N ./O
Yes/A ;/O these/D laws/N might/O be/V engraven/V on/P a/D Queen/R Anne/R 's/O forthing/N ,/O or/C the/D barb/N of/P a/D harpoon/N ,/O and/C worn/G round/N the/D neck/N ,/O so/A small/G are/V they/Q ./O
I./R A/R Fast-Fish/N belongs/V to/P the/D party/N fast/A to/P it/Q ./O
II/R ./O
A/D Loose-Fish/R is/V fair/G game/N for/P anybody/N who/Q can/O soonest/G catch/N it/Q ./O
But/C what/Q plays/V the/D mischief/N with/P this/D masterly/G code/N is/V the/D admirable/G brevity/N of/P it/Q ,/O which/O necessitates/V a/D vast/G volume/N of/P commentaries/N to/P expound/V it/Q ./O
First/R :/O What/Q is/V a/D Fast-Fish/N ?/O
Alive/G or/C dead/G a/D fish/N is/V technically/A fast/A ,/O when/O it/Q is/V connected/V with/P an/D occupied/G ship/N or/C boat/N ,/O by/P any/D medium/N at/P all/D controllable/G by/P the/D occupant/N or/C occupants/N ,/O --/O a/D mast/N ,/O an/D oar/N ,/O a/D nine-inch/G cable/N ,/O a/D telegraph/N wire/N ,/O or/C a/D strand/N of/P cobweb/R ,/O it/Q is/V all/D the/D same/G ./O
Likewise/A a/D fish/N is/V technically/A fast/A when/O it/Q bears/V a/D waif/N ,/O or/C any/D other/G recognised/G symbol/N of/P possession/N ;/O so/A long/A as/P the/D party/N waifing/V it/Q plainly/A evince/P their/Q ability/N at/P any/D time/N to/P take/V it/Q alongside/A ,/O as/A well/A as/P their/Q intention/N so/A to/P do./R ./O
These/D are/V scientific/G commentaries/N ;/O but/C the/D commentaries/N of/P the/D whalemen/N themselves/Q sometimes/A consist/V in/P hard/G words/N and/C harder/G knocks/N --/O the/D Coke-upon-Littleton/R of/P the/D fist/N ./O
True/G ,/O among/P the/D more/A upright/G and/C honourable/G whalemen/N allowances/N are/V always/A made/V for/P peculiar/G cases/N ,/O where/O it/Q would/O be/V an/D outrageous/G moral/G injustice/N for/P one/O party/N to/P claim/V possession/N of/P a/D whale/N previously/A chased/V or/C killed/V by/P another/D party/N ./O
But/C others/N are/V by/P no/D means/V so/A scrupulous/G ./O
Some/D fifty/O years/N ago/P there/O was/V a/D curious/G case/N of/P whale-trover/R litigated/V in/P England/R ,/O wherein/A the/D plaintiffs/N set/V forth/O that/P after/P a/D hard/G chase/N of/P a/D whale/N in/P the/D Northern/R seas/N ;/O and/C when/O indeed/A they/Q (/O the/D plaintiffs/N )/O had/V succeeded/V in/P harpooning/V the/D fish/N ;/O they/Q were/V at/P last/G ,/O through/P peril/N of/P their/Q lives/N ,/O obliged/V to/P forsake/V not/A only/A their/Q lines/N ,/O but/C their/Q boat/N itself/Q ./O
Ultimately/A the/D defendants/N (/O the/D crew/N of/P another/D ship/N )/O came/V up/O with/P the/D whale/N ,/O struck/V ,/O killed/V ,/O seized/V ,/O and/C finally/A appropriated/V it/Q before/P the/D very/G eyes/N of/P the/D plaintiffs/N ./O

Now/A in/P the/D present/G case/N Erskine/R contended/V that/P the/D examples/N of/P the/D whale/N and/C the/D lady/N were/V reciprocally/A illustrative/G of/P each/D other/G ./O

``/O De/R balena/R vero/R sufficit/N ,/O si/R rex/R habeat/N caput/N ,/O et/C regina/R caudam/N ./O ''/O

Latin/R from/P the/D books/N of/P the/D Laws/R of/P England/R ,/O which/O taken/V along/A with/P the/D context/N ,/O means/V ,/O that/P of/P all/D whales/N captured/V by/P anybody/N on/P the/D coast/N of/P that/D land/N ,/O the/D King/R ,/O as/P Honourary/R Grand/R Harpooneer/R ,/O must/O have/V the/D head/N ,/O and/C the/D Queen/R be/V respectfully/A presented/V with/P the/D tail/N ./O
A/D division/N which/O ,/O in/P the/D whale/N ,/O is/V much/A like/P halving/V an/D apple/N ;/O there/O is/V no/D intermediate/G remainder/N ./O
Now/A as/P this/D law/N ,/O under/P a/D modified/V form/N ,/O is/V to/P this/D day/N in/P force/N in/P England/R ;/O and/C as/P it/Q offers/V in/P various/G respects/N a/D strange/G anomaly/N touching/V the/D general/G law/N of/P Fast/R and/C Loose-Fish/R ,/O it/Q is/V here/A treated/V of/P in/P a/D separate/G chapter/N ,/O on/P the/D same/G courteous/G principle/N that/P prompts/V the/D English/R railways/N to/P be/V at/P the/D expense/N of/P a/D separate/G car/N ,/O specially/A reserved/V for/P the/D accommodation/N of/P royalty/N ./O

Now/A when/O these/D poor/G sun-burnt/N mariners/N ,/O bare-footed/G ,/O and/C with/P their/Q trowsers/N rolled/V high/A up/P on/P their/Q eely/G legs/N ,/O had/V wearily/A hauled/V their/Q fat/G fish/N high/G and/C dry/G ,/O promising/V themselves/Q a/D good/G L150/O from/P the/D precious/G oil/N and/C bone/N ;/O and/C in/P fantasy/N sipping/V rare/G tea/N with/P their/Q wives/N ,/O and/C good/G ale/N with/P their/Q cronies/N ,/O upon/P the/D strength/N of/P their/Q respective/G shares/N ;/O up/A steps/V a/D very/A learned/V and/C most/A Christian/G and/C charitable/G gentleman/N ,/O with/P a/D copy/N of/P Blackstone/R under/P his/Q arm/N ;/O and/C laying/V it/Q upon/P the/D whale/N 's/O head/N ,/O he/Q says/V --/O ``/O Hands/N off/P !/O

CHAPTER/N 92/O Ambergris/R ./O
Now/A this/D ambergris/N is/V a/D very/A curious/G substance/N ,/O and/C so/A important/G as/P an/D article/N of/P commerce/N ,/O that/P in/P 1791/O a/D certain/G Nantucket-born/G Captain/R Coffin/R was/V examined/V at/P the/D bar/N of/P the/D English/R House/R of/P Commons/R on/P that/D subject/N ./O
For/P at/P that/D time/N ,/O and/C indeed/A until/P a/D comparatively/A late/G day/N ,/O the/D precise/G origin/N of/P ambergris/R remained/V ,/O like/P amber/N itself/Q ,/O a/D problem/N to/P the/D learned/V ./O
Though/P the/D word/N ambergris/N is/V but/C the/D French/G compound/N for/P grey/G amber/N ,/O yet/C the/D two/O substances/N are/V quite/A distinct/G ./O
For/P amber/N ,/O though/A at/P times/N found/V on/P the/D sea-coast/N ,/O is/V also/A dug/V up/O in/P some/D far/G inland/N soils/N ,/O whereas/P ambergris/N is/V never/A found/V except/P upon/P the/D sea/N ./O
Besides/P ,/O amber/N is/V a/D hard/G ,/O transparent/G ,/O brittle/G ,/O odorless/G substance/N ,/O used/V for/P mouth-pieces/N to/P pipes/N ,/O for/P beads/N and/C ornaments/N ;/O but/C ambergris/R is/V soft/G ,/O waxy/G ,/O and/C so/A highly/A fragrant/G and/C spicy/N ,/O that/P it/Q is/V largely/A used/V in/P perfumery/N ,/O in/P pastiles/N ,/O precious/G candles/N ,/O hair-powders/N ,/O and/C pomatum/N ./O
The/D Turks/R use/V it/Q in/P cooking/N ,/O and/C also/A carry/V it/Q to/P Mecca/R ,/O for/P the/D same/G purpose/N that/P frankincense/N is/V carried/V to/P St./R Peter/R 's/O in/P Rome/R ./O

Yet/A so/P it/Q is/V ./O

Hence/A ,/O in/P the/D English/R ,/O this/D thing/N of/P whaling/V good/G cheer/N is/V not/A normal/G and/C natural/G ,/O but/C incidental/G and/C particular/G ;/O and/C ,/O therefore/A ,/O must/O have/V some/D special/G origin/N ,/O which/O is/V here/A pointed/V out/O ,/O and/C will/O be/V still/A further/A elucidated/V ./O

CHAPTER/N 102/O A/D Bower/N in/P the/D Arsacides/N ./O

Who/Q can/O show/V a/D pedigree/N like/P Leviathan/R ?/O

``/O Not/A far/A from/P the/D Sea-side/G ,/O they/Q have/V a/D Temple/R ,/O the/D Rafters/N and/C Beams/N of/P which/O are/V made/V of/P Whale-Bones/N ;/O for/P Whales/N of/P a/D monstrous/G size/N are/V oftentimes/A cast/V up/O dead/G upon/P that/D shore/N ./O

CHAPTER/R 105/O Does/V the/D Whale/N 's/O Magnitude/R Diminish/R ?/O
--/O Will/O He/Q Perish/V ?/O

CHAPTER/R 106/O Ahab/R 's/O Leg/R ./O

thou/N tellest/V me/Q truly/A where/O I/Q AM/V --/O but/C canst/P thou/Q cast/V the/D least/G hint/N where/O I/Q SHALL/O be/V ?/O

CHAPTER/N 132/O The/D Symphony/R ./O
